inspirationalQuote.text: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
inspirationalQuote.author: William Osler

paretoBanner.title: The Pareto 80/20 Rule
paretoBanner.description: Focus on the 20% of study material that will yield 80% of the results. Prioritize high-yield topics to study smarter, not just harder.

questionOfTheDay.question: Which of the following is the primary pacemaker of the heart?

subjects.name: Anatomy
subjects.description: The study of the structure of the human body, from macroscopic to microscopic levels.

study-guides.title: Anatomy Mnemonics
study-guides.description: A collection of helpful mnemonics for remembering complex anatomical structures.

study-guides.title: Digital Flashcard Deck
study-guides.description: Anki deck for spaced repetition of key anatomical concepts.

subjects.name: Oncology
subjects.description: The branch of medicine that deals with the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of cancer.

textbooks.title: DeVita, Hellman, and Rosenberg's Cancer: Principles & Practice of Oncology
textbooks.author: DeVita, Lawrence, Rosenberg

clinical-guidelines.title: NCCN Guidelines
clinical-guidelines.description: National Comprehensive Cancer Network guidelines for cancer treatment.

subjects.name: Cardiology
subjects.description: The study and treatment of disorders of the heart and the blood vessels.

textbooks.title: Braunwald's Heart Disease: A Textbook of Cardiovascular Medicine
textbooks.author: Zipes, Libby, Bonow

review-materials.title: ECG Interpretation Made Incredibly Easy
review-materials.description: A simplified guide to understanding electrocardiograms.

subjects.name: Pharmacology
subjects.description: The study of drug action, where a drug can be broadly defined as any man-made, natural, or endogenous molecule which exerts a biochemical or physiological effect on the cell, tissue, organ, or organism.

textbooks.title: Goodman & Gilman's: The Pharmacological Basis of Therapeutics
textbooks.author: Brunton, Knollmann, Hilal-Dandan
